Salt_Lake_City.Sugarmont (UTA station):
Sugarmont (900 east) is a streetcar stop in the Sugar House neighborhood of Salt Lake City, Utah, in the United States, served by Utah Transit Authority's (UTA) S Line (previously known as the Sugar House Streetcar). The S Line provides service from Sugar House to the city of South Salt Lake (where it connects with UTA's TRAX light rail system).


== Description ==
The Sugarmont stop (previously referred to as simply 900 East) is located at 2215 South 900 East, just east of South 900 East on the north side of Sugarmont Drive.
